languages.text: "Подношение умилостивит машину, но будь осторож{mf|ен|на} — здешний металл хранит нечто зловещее".

traits.locale_text: "Подношение умилостивит машину, но будь осторож{mf|ен|на} — здешний металл хранит нечто зловещее".

languages.text: "An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."
languages.original_text: "Подношение умилостивит машину, но будь осторож{mf|ен|на} — здешний металл хранит нечто зловещее".

traits.locale_text: "An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place houses something sinister."
"An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place houses something sinister."
"An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."
"An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."
"An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."
"An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."

languages.text: “祭品可以安抚机器，但要当心，这个地方的金属之中潜藏着邪恶之物。”
languages.original_text: "An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."

traits.locale_text: “祭品可以安抚机器，但要当心，这个地方的金属之中潜藏着邪恶之物。”

languages.text: «Una ofrenda apaciguará a la máquina, pero tenga cuidado. El metal de este lugar alberga algo siniestro».
languages.original_text: "An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."

traits.locale_text: «Una ofrenda apaciguará a la máquina, pero tenga cuidado. El metal de este lugar alberga algo siniestro».

languages.text: 「捧げ物で機械を大人しくできるだろうが、注意せねば。この場所の金属は、不吉な何かを宿している」
languages.original_text: "An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."

traits.locale_text: 「捧げ物で機械を大人しくできるだろうが、注意せねば。この場所の金属は、不吉な何かを宿している」

languages.text: "Ein Opfer wird die Maschine besänftigen, aber Vorsicht – das Metall an diesem Ort beherbergt etwas Bösartiges."
languages.original_text: "An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Opfer wird die Maschine besänftigen, aber Vorsicht – das Metall an diesem Ort beherbergt etwas Bösartiges."

languages.text: « Une offrande apaisera la machine, mais méfiez-vous... Le métal qui compose ce vaisseau abrite quelque force obscure. »
languages.original_text: "An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."

traits.locale_text: « Une offrande apaisera la machine, mais méfiez-vous... Le métal qui compose ce vaisseau abrite quelque force obscure. »

languages.text: "Makine, bir adakla tatmin olacaktır. Ancak tertipli olmalı. Zira bu mekândaki metalde şer gizli."
languages.original_text: "An offering will appease the machine, but take heed — the metal of this place harbours something sinister."

traits.locale_text: "Makine, bir adakla tatmin olacaktır. Ancak tertipli olmalı. Zira bu mekândaki metalde şer gizli."
